name: Protect Him (Sockman)
description:
A short puzzle game I made for Ludum Dare 43, the theme is "Sacrifices must be made"

The goal is to protect someone at all costs, even if it means some sacrifice to do so...

I had to cut a lot of corners for this. The graphics are unpolished and there are only five levels, but I hope the mechanic is interesting enough. Please give feedback, I don't expect to win but I hope to get valuable feedback, so I can come back next time.
